TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementEventWatcher extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: Subscribes to temporary event notifications based on a specified *event query*.

span.span: Subscribes to temporary event notifications based on a specified *event query*.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/cs/ManagementEventWatcher.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/vb/ManagementEventWatcher.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中監看員會接聽事件是目前設定的預設命名空間。The namespace in which the watcher will be listening for events is the default namespace that is currently set. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 在此程式碼範例中，用戶端會收到通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。In this code example, the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得已傳遞的 WMI 事件。Gets the WMI event that was delivered.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 要套用到事件，也就是等於的準則*事件查詢*。The criteria to apply to the events, which is equal to the *event query*. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query/cs/ManagementEventWatcher_Query.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query/vb/ManagementEventWatcher_Query.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 在其中監看事件 （命名空間或範圍） 的範圍。The scope in which to watch for events (namespace or scope). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得作業的完成狀態。Gets the completion status of the operation.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Management.ManagementBaseObject WaitForNextEvent() cil managed

summary.span: Waits for the next event that matches the specified query to arrive, and then returns it.

span.span: Waits for the next event that matches the specified query to arrive, and then returns it.

returns.span: A representing the newly arrived event.

span.span: A representing the newly arrived event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件監看員物件包含選項，以指定的逾時，API 會等待下一個事件只會針對指定的時間; 數量否則下, 一個事件發生之前，將會封鎖應用程式開發介面。If the event watcher object contains options with a specified time-out, the API will wait for the next event only for the specified amount of time; otherwise, the API will be blocked until the next event occurs. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent/cs/ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent/vb/ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent.vb#1)]
